title: Limit of Kindred Stacks?
body: Does anyone know if there is a limit to how many stacks she/he/it can have and if there is a limit what is it?

replies.body:
It is functionally unlimited, though likely there is a hard limit much the same way as there is a limit on Kali spears. It'd be a limit far too high to ever worry about reaching in a real game, but if you felt like messing around with bots for a REALLY long time you could probably hit it. I imagine it'd be at least up in the 100s, that or it'd just get so high something would break and the game would crash.

Short answer: No.

Programatically the limit would be 255 assuming riot stores the passive stacks in an Integer based variable.

Take thresh stacks, they have the same limit where you reach 255 souls and in order to break that limitation they just start a new stack and roll the previous stack into a secondary stacks counting how many 255 stacks you have.
Maybe so, but it would be effectively capped at 80 stacks, as that would provide 100% of the targets health as damage, meaning 1-hit kills all around (anything more would be redundant).
Omgosh I didn't think of that, that's insane! I doubt anything close would ever happen in a real game, but it would be hilarious to watch :3

Its a tad more than 80 stacks actually, 80 stacks is 100% current hp - armor reduction.

So lets say they had 100 armor you would need 160 stacks with no armor pen whatsoever to one hit.
I hit 20 in a hexakill. It is so much fun. You shred anything.

pretty sure its unlimited.
